title: LF a Duo/Team - I'm a support/Mid main!
body:
Hi there!
I'm a support main and am looking for another player to duo with in ranked,  I haven't played many games of ranked however I really would like to. I've been told by my plat friends that I should be playing ranked already as they believe I could have climbed alot already.  However he already has another player with him.  Looking for either another player to duo with or a ranked teams. Thanks and please let me know! :)

P.S - I main Janna/Leona Support and in mid  (2nd pref.) Orianna / Ahri / Lulu

replies.body: Hey man, feel free to add me if you want, we can duo. I'm a top/jg main.
I'll add you later for sure,  working at the moment add you later!
